name: Arcade Station (Ludum Dare 51)
description:
Manage your orbital station and attract more and more people.

▶ Every 10 seconds you can add a new building.

▶ Find balance between homes, farms, generator and arcades to increase happiness and grow Arcade Station population.

Game created for the Ludum Dare 51 (Theme : Every 10 seconds)
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/citybuilder-working-title

Programming - Clément

Music / Sound Design - Lène

Graphics - Joé
